amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to implement section 9012 of the bill which authorizes the Secretary of Defense to operate a task force for business and stability operations in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike funds to be used for the Task Force for Business and Stability Operations in Afghanistan or section 9012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A035) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Ms. McCollum.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A035) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
